targets.expr: sum((rate(node_cgroup_cpuacct_usage_total_seconds{envtype=~"$envtype",app="$appname",instance=~"$instance"}[3m])) / (node_cgroup_cpu_cfs_quota_seconds / 0.1) AND node_cgroup_cpu_cfs_quota_seconds > 0 ) by (instance) OR on() vector(0)

targets.expr: sum((rate(instance_gc_duration_seconds_sum{app="$appname",instance=~"$instance",name=~"g1_young_generation|g1 young generation|copy|parnew|ps_scavenge|ps scavenge",envtype=~"$envtype"}[2m]) / rate(instance_gc_duration_seconds_count{app="$appname",instance=~"$instance",name=~"g1_young_generation|g1 young generation|copy|parnew|ps_scavenge|ps scavenge",envtype=~"$envtype"}[2m])) / 1000) by (instance)
